channel.title: archivesspace on Mark A. Matienzo
channel.description: Recent content in archivesspace on Mark A. Matienzo

item.title: ArchivesSpace
item.description: ArchivesSpace is an open source archival management system. During the project’s grant-funded phases in 2010-2013, I worked as a technical consultant during the planning phase, and as Technical Architect and product owner during the implementation phase.
